summary: This document contains financial statements related to accounts held by Jeffrey Epstein at Bear Stearns & Co. Inc. It details cash flow analysis, portfolio holdings, and account balances as of December 29, 2006. The statements indicate a cash balance of $-0.02 and provide information on revenue sharing practices and interest rates applicable to the accounts.
